contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|zombi}} '''Zombi''' may refer to: * [[Zombie]], traditionally an undead person in the Caribbean spiritual belief system of voodoo * [[Zombi (film)|''Zombi'' (film)]] or ''Dawn of the Dead'', a 1978 film by George Romero * [[Zombi (band)]], a space rock band from Pittsburgh * "Zombi", a song by P-MODEL from the album ''[[Perspective (P-MODEL album)|Perspective]]'' * [[Zombi (video game)|''Zombi'' (video game)]], a computer game published in 1986 * [[Zombi (African god)]], a snake-deity in Voodoo cults of West Africa and Haiti * [[Zombi series]], a set of horror films ==See also== * [[Zombie (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation}} [[es:Zombi (desambiguaciÃ³n)]]
